meanings.definition: The act of emitting or flowing out in a stream.
meanings.sent1: The spoutings of water from the fountain were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: I could hear the spoutings of the tea kettle in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The spoutings of laughter from the comedy show filled the room.
meanings.sent4: Her spoutings of creativity knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The spoutings of lava from the volcano painted the sky red.

meanings.definition: Material that is emitted or flows out in a stream.
meanings.sent1: The spoutings of hot chocolate overflowed from the cup.
meanings.sent2: The spoutings of oil from the machine caused a mess.
meanings.sent3: The spoutings of glitter from the craft project sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: Her spoutings of ideas were always innovative.
meanings.sent5: The spoutings of ink from the pen stained the paper.
